name: Ultimate Panic Kansei Drift – AtomicStage
description:
ユルティメート・パニック・慣性ドリフト—アトミック・ステージ

You are in a 86 and you need to escape a nuclear explosion by drifting your way between obstacles.

Left arrow – turn left
Right arrow – turn right
Space – launch kansei drift
Shift + Direction – basic drift

Made with Godot 3 in not enough of time by Auroden & NaejDoree for a 24h Game Jam whose theme was « Atomic ».
